validation.email: The '{attribute}' field must be a valid email address.

password.min: The '{attribute}' field must be at least '{min}' characters long.
password.uppercase: The '{attribute}' field must contain at least one uppercase letter.
password.lowercase: The '{attribute}' field must contain at least one lowercase letter.
password.number: The '{attribute}' field must contain at least one number.
password.special: The '{attribute}' field must contain at least one special character.
password.confirmed: The '{attribute}' field confirmation does not match.
password.strength: The '{attribute}' field must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, and one special character.

validation.unique: The '{attribute}' field you entered is already in use.
validation.url: The '{attribute}' field must be a valid URL.
validation.number: The '{attribute}' field must be a valid number.
validation.numeric: The '{attribute}' field must be a valid number.
validation.integer: The '{attribute}' field must be a valid integer.
validation.string: The '{attribute}' field must be a character string.
validation.boolean: The '{attribute}' field must be a boolean.
validation.digits: The '{attribute}' field must be digits only.
validation.date: The '{attribute}' field must be a valid date.
validation.dateISO: The '{attribute}' field must be a valid date (ISO).
validation.creditcard: The '{attribute}' field must be a valid credit card number.
validation.equalTo: The '{attribute}' field must be equal to {other}.
validation.extension: The '{attribute}' field must have a valid extension.
validation.maxlength: The '{attribute}' field must be no more than {max} characters long.
validation.minlength: The '{attribute}' field must be at least {min} characters long.
validation.rangelength: The '{attribute}' field must be between {min} and {max} characters long.
validation.range: The '{attribute}' field must be between {min} and {max}.
validation.max: The '{attribute}' field must be no more than {max}.
validation.min: The '{attribute}' field must be at least {min}.
validation.step: The '{attribute}' field must be a multiple of {step}.
validation.pattern: The '{attribute}' field must match the pattern {pattern}.
validation.phone: The '{attribute}' field must be a valid phone number.
validation.postalcode: The '{attribute}' field must be a valid postal code.
validation.ipv4: The '{attribute}' field must be a valid IPv4 address.
validation.ipv6: The '{attribute}' field must be a valid IPv6 address.
validation.ip: The '{attribute}' field must be a valid IP address.
validation.mac: The '{attribute}' field must be a valid MAC address.
validation.uuid: The '{attribute}' field must be a valid UUID.
